project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, keeps track of their score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Define the question and answer variables for the quiz game.
Implement the question display and user input functionality.
Implement score tracking for the user's answers.
Implement the logic to display the final score at the end of the game.
Write tests for the implemented features (question display, scoring, final score).
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly.
